p.b: Those who are interested in using Catalyst, but have no idea where to begin and are looking for support, may be interested in the recently created gentoo-catalyst@gentoo.org mailing list!

body.p: Catalyst, the Release Engineering team's metatool used for creating installation stages, LiveCDs, and GRP, has been traditionally supported on the gentoo-releng mailing list.
For more information on mailing lists, such as how to subscribe, please consult the mailing list support page.
